widgets.title: Active Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys WHERE status = 'active'

widgets.title: Draft Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys WHERE status = 'draft'

widgets.title: Archived Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys WHERE status = 'archived'

sections.title: Recent Surveys
sections.query: SELECT title, status, created_at FROM surveys ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5

sections.title: Top Categories
sections.query: SELECT sc.name, COUNT(s.id) AS survey_count FROM survey_categories sc LEFT JOIN surveys s ON sc.id = s.category_id GROUP BY sc.name ORDER BY survey_count DESC LIMIT 5

sections.title: Recent User Activities
sections.query: SELECT a.id, u.username, a.action, a.details, a.created_at FROM audit_logs a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT 5

sections.title: Recent Feedback
sections.query: SELECT f.id, u.username, f.message, f.rating, f.created_at FROM feedback f LEFT JOIN users u ON f.user_id = u.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
